thoughts.text: The 'execute_shell' command returned the current working directory. We are in the correct directory. We can use the 'list_files' command to list the files in the current directory and confirm if the file 'my_river_poem.txt' exists. If it doesn't, we can use the 'write_to_file' command to write the contents of the poem to a file named 'my_river_poem.txt'.
